title: Viewing metrics data | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Preview Feature — Open
Metrics data collection is a preview feature available to all accounts.
You can view metrics data for analysis in the following ways:
Use Snowsight or Grafana.
Execute a SELECT command on the event table.
Note
Before you can begin using metrics data, you must enable telemetry data collection.
You can use Snowsight to view metrics data captured in the event table.
Sign in to Snowsight.
In the navigation menu, select Monitoring » Query History.
In the Query History page, select the query for which you want to view metrics data.
Select the Query Telemetry tab.
Select the span for which you want to view data, then select the Related Metrics tab.
View the time series metrics over the course of the query and metrics over time.
You can also use free partner tools, such as Grafana Cloud, to visualize the metrics data.
For Snowflake dashboard templates and installation instructions for Grafana Cloud, see Snowflake Telemetry Dashboard Templates.
